name: Fores – Forum för reformer och entreprenörskap
goal:
Fores – Forum for Reforms, Entrepreneurship and Sustainability – is the green and liberal think tank. We are a foundation and non-profit NGO and we want to renew the debate in Sweden with a belief in entrepreneurship and creating opportunities for people to shape their own lives.

Market-based solutions to climate change and other environmental challenges, the long-term benefits of migration and a welcoming society, the gains of increased levels of entrepreneurship, the need for a modernization of the welfare sector and the challenges of the rapidly changing digital society – these are some of the issues we focus on.

The 2030-secretariat was formed in 2013 för att driva på the development of a fossil fuel independent transport sector. A goal of 70% CO2 reduction in the transport sector by 2030 was approved by the Swedish Parliament.

The 2030-secretariat consists of more than 70 partners from industry, and the 2030-secretariat is politically and technologically neutral.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Transport
euInitiatives:
Clean Vehicle Directive
Renewable Energy Directive (REDII)
Energy Union
Low Emission Mobility Strategy
State Aid Rules
